Project Rere supports Social Enterprises in Africa and Asia.

Working on improving access to Education in Nigeria? Apply now for our Podcast and Grant!

Apply

We hope to inspire more people to support Social Enterprises, and begin their own social impact journey.

Awareness

We share stories about and provide grants to Social Enterprises in Africa and Asia.

Podcasts

Through stories, we aim to provide Social Enterprises access to an audience of curious listeners and investors.

Grants

We use our grant capital to support the growth of creative and innovative ideas developed by Social Entrepreneurs.

Join us as we promote positive social change across Africa and Asia
